inclusion.label: not_met
inclusion.evidence: awakenings due to asthmatic symptoms at least once a week

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: doesn't smoke or use illicit drugs

inclusion.label: not_met
inclusion.evidence: uses inhaled corticosteroid (ICS) and fluticasone 500 mcg/salmeterol 50 mcg, one puff twice daily

exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: no recent symptoms of a cold or flu

exclusion.label: met
exclusion.evidence: uses inhaled corticosteroid (ICS) and fluticasone 500 mcg/salmeterol 50 mcg, one puff twice daily

notes: Patient has a history of asthma and is not optimally controlled with short-acting beta agonists. He uses inhaled corticosteroids but this does not exclude him from the study.
